Text: This Is Spinal Tap (stylized as This Is Spın̈al Tap) is a 1984 American rock music mockumentary comedy film directed, co-written, scored by, and starring Rob Reiner, and co-starring Christopher Guest, Michael McKean and Harry Shearer.

1:
--------------------
<Text: This Is Spinal Tap:  The film portrays the fictional British heavy metal band Spinal Tap.>
Triplets:<This Is Spinal Tap
2:
--------------------
Text: This Is Spinal Tap:  The film satirizes the wild personal behavior and musical pretensions of hard rock and heavy metal bands, as well as the hagiographic tendencies of rock documentaries of the time.
Triplets:<This Is Spinal Tap
3:
Text: This Is Spinal Tap:  The three main members of Spinal Tap—David St. Hubbins, Derek Smalls and Nigel Tufnel—are played by actors McKean, Shearer, and Guest, respectively.
Triplets:<This Is Spinal Tap
4:
--------------------
Text: This Is Spinal Tap:  The three actors play their musical instruments and speak with mock English accents throughout the movie.
